actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the capital loss carryovers of individuals to $10,000.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $10,000 the limitation on the amount of losses from the sale or exchange of capital assets that an individual taxpayer may deduct in a taxable year beginning after December 31, 2007.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the capital loss carryovers of individuals to $10,000.
